subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Cadel Evans of Australia won the next-to-last stage of the Tirreno-Adriatico race to increase his overall lead to nine seconds over Michele Scarponi of Italy.
snippet: Cadel Evans of Australia won the next-to-last stage of the Tirreno-Adriatico race to increase his overall lead to nine seconds over Michele Scarponi of Italy.
